title: Others
description: More essential design resources and tools. Discover utilities for design collaboration, conversion tools, design education, analytics, and other helpful resources that enhance your design workflow. Everything you need to work smarter.

resources.title: 10015.io
resources.description: 10015.io is a “free all-in-one toolbox” solution created to ease your life by preventing bookmark mess.

resources.title: Adjust
resources.description: Adjust is the mobile marketing platform for marketers around the world wanting to grow their app.

resources.title: Adobe CC Express
resources.description: Quick and easy design tool for creating social media graphics, videos, web pages, and more. Thousands of templates and Adobe Stock assets at your fingertips.

resources.title: AppsFlyer
resources.description: The world’s top marketing and product teams turn to AppsFlyer to power predictable app growth, protect customer privacy, and deliver exceptional mobile experiences.

resources.title: Avocode
resources.description: Design handoff tool that converts designs to code. Export CSS, Swift, and Android XML from Sketch, Figma, and Adobe XD files automatically.

resources.title: Components.ai
resources.description: Visual editors for HTML, CSS, and SVG. Customize, curate, and publish designs faster than ever.

resources.title: Design Sprint Kit
resources.description: Transform the way your team works.

resources.title: Ethical Design Resources
resources.description: Practical resources to learn about design ethics and its methodologies.

resources.title: Hotjar
resources.description: Understand how users behave on your site, what they need, and how they feel, fast.

resources.title: Lorem Ipsum
resources.description: Generate placeholder text for your designs and mockups. Includes classic Lorem Ipsum and alternative filler text options in various languages.

resources.title: Media Queries
resources.description: A handy tool that helps designers examine the responsiveness of a variety of web sites.

resources.title: Pattern Monster
resources.description: Customizable SVG patterns for your projects.

resources.title: People + AI Research
resources.description: People + AI Research (PAIR) is a multidisciplinary team at Google that explores the human side of AI by doing fundamental research, building tools, creating design frameworks, and working with diverse communities.

resources.title: Pitch
resources.description: Modern collaborative presentation software with beautiful templates. Create, edit, and present together in real-time with your team.

resources.title: Pixcleaner
resources.description: Free background remover and image converter JPEG or PNG to Webp.

resources.title: ProApp Design
resources.description: Courses curated by creators with industry experience & passion for design.

resources.title: Rocket
resources.description: Rocket is a free Mac app that makes typing emoji faster and easier using Slack-style shortcuts.

resources.title: Sharpen
resources.description: Sharpen is a free design challenge generator used by tens of thousands of designers and educators worldwide to practice and teach graphic design, UX, branding, and more.

resources.title: Speak Human
resources.description: Generate human centric microcopy for all purposes.

resources.title: Tilt Brush by Google
resources.description: Tilt Brush lets you paint in 3D space with virtual reality.

resources.title: Use The Keyboard
resources.description: A collection of keyboard shortcuts for Mac apps, Windows programs, and websites.

resources.title: UX Tools
resources.description: We make several free tools and projects for product designers.

resources.title: Web Desigm Museum
resources.description: Web Design Museum exhibits over 2,000 carefully selected and sorted web sites that show web design trends between the years 1991 and 2006.

resources.title: Zeplin
resources.description: Organize screens. Publish locked designs. Scale design systems. All in a workspace friendly to the entire team, including non-designers.
